tool_description: Collects and validates basic vendor information during the initial registration process, ensuring all required fields are complete and properly formatted.

vendor_name.description: Legal name of the vendor company

business_type.description: Type of business entity (corporation, LLC, partnership, sole_proprietorship)

error_messages: Invalid email format: Provide a valid email address format (example@domain.com).
Invalid business type: Use one of [corporation, LLC, partnership, sole_proprietorship].
Missing required field: All fields (vendor_name, business_type, contact_email, phone_number, address) must be provided.
Invalid phone format: Provide phone number in valid format with country code.
usage: Provide all required vendor details to create a structured vendor profile. This tool validates the information format and completeness before storing.

vendor_id.description: Unique identifier assigned to the vendor

registration_status.description: Status of the registration (pending, complete, error)

validation_results.description: List of validation messages for each field
